projects.title: RESTful Blog API
projects.description: A robust backend API handling user authentication, CRUD operations for blog posts, and comment management. Designed for scalability.

projects.title: Animated Portfolio
projects.description: A highly interactive landing page showcasing the developer's work. Features smooth scrolling and reveal animations.

projects.title: E-Commerce Microservices API
projects.description: A scalable microservices architecture for e-commerce with separate services for products, orders, inventory, and payments.

projects.title: AI Image Generator
projects.description: An AI-powered image generation tool using Stable Diffusion API. Users can create custom images from text prompts.

projects.title: Real-time Collaboration Tool
projects.description: A collaborative whiteboard app with real-time cursor tracking, drawing tools, and video chat using WebRTC.

projects.title: 3D Product Viewer
projects.description: An interactive 3D product showcase using Three.js with zoom, rotation, and material customization features.

projects.title: Weather API Wrapper
projects.description: A proxy service for 3rd party weather APIs that implements caching to reduce rate limits and improve response times.

projects.title: Glassmorphic Weather
projects.description: A visually stunning weather dashboard using the glassmorphism trend. Shows real-time data fetched from our wrapper.

projects.title: Recipe API & Search
projects.description: A complex data API allowing users to search recipes by ingredients. Utilizes advanced querying capabilities of Supabase.

projects.title: Particle System Gen
projects.description: A canvas-based generator for creating dynamic particle backgrounds. Users can export configurations for their own sites.
